titleStmt.title: H. B. Underhill et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2171

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
To His Excellency
Hon Thos E. Bramlette.
Governor of the State of Kentucky

We the undersigned residents of Stockton, San Joaquin County, California. having been personally acquainted with the applicant Mr Lewis M Cutting for several years past would respectfully recomend him to your Excellency as a loyal & suitable person for appointment to act as Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky
Mr F. C. Andrew formerly acting as commissioner for most of the State died some 12 months since & at present there is no one acting in that capacity here.

Comr Deeds
California
Lewis M. Cutting
apptd & comd
8th Aug/65
